divs: Sighting DetailsSitting outside in a friend's backyard, I noticed what I assumed was a plane in the night sky. It was moving across the sky like normal, and then came to a complete stop. It stayed in place for a long time, and I said to my friends what I had just seen. Because it was no longer moving, everyone around me was convinced that it was just a star, and that I had imagined it moving. However, I strongly believe what I saw moved for the couple of minutes from when I first noticed it and then came to a halt. I felt surprised and excited, but mostly alarmed.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Worth
There were no other sightings in Worth on or around May 29th 2010
